name: A tarnished brass compass
data: It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'navigators way'.
The compass allows the user to maintain directional orientation,
even when cloud cover prevents celestial navigation.
